bibl.title: Reflecting the "Change in A.D. 140": The Veteran Categories of the epikrisis Documents Revisited.
bibl.note: Paper presented on 18 August 2010 at the 26th International Congress of Papyrology (Geneva). - I. The epikrisis examination in Roman Egypt. - II. The disparity in veteran privileges before and after 140. - III. The impact of the "change in 140" on epikrisis documents: Identifying the first veteran group. - IV. Identifying the second and third veteran group. - Conclusion. - Proposes a new supplement in line 11 of P.S.I. V, 447.
bibl.seg: Waebens Sofie, Reflecting the "Change in A.D. 140": The Veteran Categories of the epikrisis Documents Revisited.

Paper presented on 18 August 2010 at the 26th International Congress of Papyrology (Geneva). - I. The epikrisis examination in Roman Egypt. - II. The disparity in veteran privileges before and after 140. - III. The impact of the "change in 140" on epikrisis documents: Identifying the first veteran group. - IV. Identifying the second and third veteran group. - Conclusion. - Proposes a new supplement in line 11 of P.S.I. V, 447.
